description: API Permissions section showing app types that can call this API

response_fields.name: error_in_item_promotion_image_item_lock
response_fields.description: Can't update images when item is under promotion.

response_fields.name: error_in_item_promotion_name_item_lock
response_fields.description: Can't update item_name when item is under promotion.

response_fields.name: error_in_item_promotion_unlist_lock
response_fields.description: Can't unlist item when item is under promotion.

response_fields.name: error_in_item_promotion_description_lock
response_fields.description: Can't update description when item is under promotion.

response_fields.name: error_flash_sale_days_to_ship_lock
response_fields.description: Days_to_ship cannot be changed when item is under ongoing/upcoming flash sale.

response_fields.name: error_slash_price_not_lowest
response_fields.description: In slash sale, price should not be lower or same as slash price.

response_fields.name: error_whole_sale_min_count_incorrect
response_fields.description: Internal error, please contact openapi team.

response_fields.name: error_whole_sale_price_setting_incorrect
response_fields.description: Wholesale price can't more than original price.

update_log.details: The request field "certification_type" has been removed. If this field is still passed in the request, it will be ignored by the system.
Add permit ID for PH product certification
